== Kunnummal (CT) (627356) ==

Kunnummal (CT) is a town in the [[Vadakara]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 10.59 sq. km. and harbouring 4303 households with total population of 18031 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 45 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 455 km. Male population is 8479 and female population is 9552. Scheduled Caste population is 392 and Scheduled Tribes population is 24. Census Location Code of the town is 627356<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 45 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 45 km. Railway station is at Vadakara at a distance of 23 km.
